short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you convert Epoch Timestamp into Human Readable Time on highlight.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you convert Epoch Timestamp into Human Readable Time on highlight. Just select any epoch timestamp and it should show you the human readable time in the tooltip.
